metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7477 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The ff_put_pixels8_xy2_mmx function in rnd_template.c in Libav 11.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory access and crash) via a crafted mp3 file.  NOTE: this issue was originally reported as involving a NULL pointer dereference.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix as of 2016-10-18 ebarretto> no fix as of 2018-09-28

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
